Package emissary.core

Class IBaseDataObjectXmlHelper

java.lang.Object
emissary.core.IBaseDataObjectXmlHelper
public final class IBaseDataObjectXmlHelper extends Object
This class helps convert IBaseDataObjects to and from XML.

    • createStandardInitialIbdo

      public static IBaseDataObject createStandardInitialIbdo(SeekableByteChannelFactory sbcf, String classification, String formAndFileType, KffDataObjectHandler kff)
      Setup a typical BDO
      Parameters:
      sbcf - initial channel factory for the data
      classification - initial classification string
      formAndFileType - initial form and file type
      kff - an existing Kff handler
      Returns:
      a typical BDO with the specified data

    • ibdoFromXml

      public static IBaseDataObject ibdoFromXml(org.jdom2.Document document, List<IBaseDataObject> children, IBaseDataObjectXmlCodecs.ElementDecoders decoders)
      Creates an IBaseDataObject and associated children from an XML document.
      Parameters:
      document - containing the IBaseDataObject and children descriptions.
      children - the list where the children will be added.
      decoders - used to decode XML into ibdo.
      Returns:
      the IBaseDataObject.

    • ibdoFromXmlMainElements

      public static IBaseDataObject ibdoFromXmlMainElements(org.jdom2.Element element, IBaseDataObject ibdo, IBaseDataObjectXmlCodecs.ElementDecoders decoders)
      Creates an IBaseDataObject from an XML element excluding Extracted Records and children.
      Parameters:
      element - to create IBaseDataObject from.
      ibdo - to apply the element values to.
      decoders - used to decode XML into ibdo.
      Returns:
      the IBaseDataObject that was passed in.

    • xmlFromIbdo

      public static String xmlFromIbdo(IBaseDataObject parent, List<IBaseDataObject> children, IBaseDataObject initialIbdo, IBaseDataObjectXmlCodecs.ElementEncoders encoders)
      Creates an XML string from a parent IBaseDataObject and a list of children IBaseDataObjects.
      Parameters:
      parent - the parent IBaseDataObject
      children - the children IBaseDataObjects.
      initialIbdo - the initial IBaseDataObject.
      encoders - used to encode ibdo into XML.
      Returns:
      the XML string.

    • xmlFromIbdoMainElements

      public static void xmlFromIbdoMainElements(IBaseDataObject ibdo, org.jdom2.Element element, IBaseDataObjectXmlCodecs.ElementEncoders encoders)
      Creates xml from the IBaseDataObject excluding the extracted records and children.
      Parameters:
      ibdo - to create xml from.
      element - to add the xml to.
      encoders - used to encode ibdo into XML.
